entities.name: side
entities.description: The person who dropped something and is now talking to the others. The text describes them as a stranger.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as sitting frozen with fear on the sofa. He is also referred to as a 'great lump' by the stranger.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the text and is described as looking like his dad but having his mum's eyes.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is crouching behind with Harry's mother, who is terrified.

relationships.description: The stranger talks to Dudley and asks him to make a cup of tea.
The stranger recognizes Harry from before, when he was just a baby.
